page.title: 08MOTORWAY AND LOCAL POLICE
page.content: Inspector Harrison and PC Shepherd are 2 of 62 policemen in our area.The Carcroft Depot garages :-2 Jaguars 13 Rovers 3 Range Rovers ,12 motorbikes. Insp. Harrison, born 13-10-40, has been a policeman for 26 years and a Traffic policeman for 4.5 years. P.C. Shepherd,born 19-12-52,has been a policeman for 12 years.Their jobs include stopping Joy-Riders, speeders and accidents. The Depot has a "Cell Bus" which carries prisoners to other prisons,and Courts.One Range-Rover has a "Stem-Light" which is used at night. P.C.Gardiner has been a Community Policeman for 2 of the 17 years he has been a policeman.He works at Bentley 9am -5pm.The commonest crime is theft. There are 35 Policemen at Bentley.The station has 2 Police cars and 2 beat cars.PC Gardiner had to train for 2.5 years to be a policeman.
